text: Just needed to vent I know no one is going to read this but I m writing it so that I know I told someone   If that even makes any sense I m a female and I m    almost  I just need someone I can tell my feelings to I m not the greatest writer but I m gonna do my best to have this all make sense    My Story   I was adopted at age    amp    by my parents I have today  I don t know remember too much about the whole adoption thing but I ll say what I know  My parents told me I was found  not by them  near a police station  I had been with my birth parents for about two months  In a way I feel rejected by them  Like they didn t want me so they got rid of me   On top of all that I have this thing called M bius syndrome Here s a brief breakdown of what it is M bius syndrome is a rare congenital neurological disorder which is characterized by facial paralysis and the inability to move the eyes from side to side  Most people with M bius syndrome are born with complete facial paralysis and cannot close their eyes or form facial expressions    Honestly I look like an absolute weirdo A few years ago I struggled with self worth  I just felt like I didn t matter  That kind of went away for awhile until this year  This year it has hit me a lot harder  I feel depressed   of the time  Now more than ever I m considering suicide  I have started cutting myself and I ve been getting high  Getting high takes me away from reality for a while  No one really cares about me  so they wouldn t notice if I left  Seriously  they wouldn t I don t want to die   But I don t want to life feeling depressed and worthless   I just can t If anyone actually read this in its entirety  THANK YOU    I mostly wrote this so that I could get my feelings and thoughts out

text: I m so scared I won t be able to do itI m sorry if my writing isn t very good right now  but I m scared and the posts on this sub always help me through these kinds of things So I ve had a plan for a long time now  and I ve had this date in my mind for later in the year  so that I ve got enough time to fully prepare or so that I ve had adequate time to change my mind if some sort of miracle had happened and life was worth living for some reason  I chose the date when thinking of my little sister  I m listlessly trying to minimize the impact of my death on her and it would be the shittiest thing in the world to celebrate your  th birthday the same year your older sister had died  so it must be after her birthday this year But it s now less than   days to the date and it s time to book the motel and buy the equipment  and I m so so scared  I can t be alive anymore  I can t bear to even think about continuing to pull myself out of bed each morning to another day as fucking horrible as the last  I don t even want to try think about continuing to live past this date and having to be alive and living through this fucking horrible life with all this fucking pain inside me always I know that suicide is a selfish act but nowadays it really fucking makes me sick to listen to people say things like  what about your family   what about the people who love you    because  honestly  what about me   Why don t I deserve peace  Why should I have to continue pushing myself through this pain and crying and screaming and being by myself for the happiness of other  I know that didn t make sense  but I know that some of you must all understand this I ve tried medications and therapy but things will never change  That s what I ve had to learn  Things will never change  There is nothing left except for myself and the pain  Nobody in my real life understands what I mean  So  please  someone   please talk to me and tell me I m strong enough

text: A Good Dayim not quite sure how to word this  ive made an account primarily to make this one post  Early this year  i decided that enough was enough and i should probably just go forward with the end  as i drank at my second job on an off day  i was more and more ready for the end  as i made my walk to the bridge  i was stopped by a former boss of mine  i cried into his arms  why am i so weird  and he carried me to his car  leaning on his shoulder because i could hardly walk  and took me home  when i woke up in the morning  i was angry  i was so ready to go and he stopped me  that was in january and although ive made strides to better my situation  ive come to the realization that life isnt bad  life is wonderful  im just not fit for it  im not fit to have friends or family  theres just a disconnect between me and social life  ive had a lot of people try to hang out  but i cant talk about anything but my job  all i talk about is food and it is upsetting to me to know that i lack any ability to make a great friendship or relationship that isnt based on sex  which leaves me to my burden  ive decided that the  th of this month will be my last day  im going to try and get my affairs in order and shop for my daughters birthday and leave a testimony for her and my family about how much i love them before i go  does anyone have any advice on this  this is also my first post  so i apologize if i wrote this wrong or anything  thank you
